text: "Ka-Ching!" is the Japanese debut single by Exo-CBX, the first official sub- unit of the South Korean boy group Exo. It was officially released on May 24, 2017 by Avex Trax as the title track of their debut Japanese extended play Girls. The song was first revealed in the short version of the music video on May 1, 2017. "Ka-Ching!" was re-released as a b-side track in EXO-CBX's first Japanese studio album Magic on May 9, 2018. == Background and release == "Ka- Ching!" is described as a catchy pop-tune song that blends elements of jazz with electronica, resulting in an eclectic tune that's as energetic as it is quirky. == Music video == On May 1, 2017, a short music video of "Ka-Ching!" was released. The music video features the members with backup dancers showcasing some incredibly energetic choreography in various lavishly decorated casino sets. == Promotions == Exo-CBX performed "Ka-Ching!" for the first time at the 2017 Girls Awards on May 3, 2017. On June 7, the group performed "Ka-Ching!" on Exo-CBX "Colorful BoX" Free Showcase. On August 26, Exo-CBX performed "Ka-Ching!" on A-Nation concert in Japan. Exo-CBX performed a Korean version of the song on Exo's concert Exo Planet 4 – The EℓyXiOn. == References == Category:2017 songs Category:2017 singles Category:Japanese- language songs Category:Avex Trax singles Category:Exo-CBX songs
